00013                 self::connectDB();

00032         public static function createTSFE() {
00033                 global $TYPO3_CONF_VARS;
00034                 $temp_TSFEclassName = t3lib_div::makeInstanceClassName('tslib_fe');
00035                 if(!is_a($GLOBALS['TSFE'],$temp_TSFEclassName)) {
00036                         // Include classes necessary for initializing frontend user:
00037                         // We will use tslib_fe to do that:
00038                         require_once(PATH_tslib.'class.tslib_fe.php');
00039                         require_once(PATH_t3lib.'class.t3lib_cs.php');
00040 
00041                         // Make new instance of TSFE object
00042                         $GLOBALS['TSFE'] = new $temp_TSFEclassName($TYPO3_CONF_VARS,0,0,true);
00043 
00044                 }
00045         }

00048                 self::createTSFE();
00049                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->includeTCA();

00053                 self::initFeUser();
00054                 self::createTSFE();
00055         
00056                 require_once(PATH_t3lib.'class.t3lib_page.php');
00057

00060                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->determineId();
00061                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->getConfigArray();

00063                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->newCObj();

00072     public static function getInstanceOfPiBase($withCObject = true) {
00073         if (!class_exists('tslib_pibase', false)) {
00074             require_once PATH_tslib . 'class.tslib_pibase.php';
00075         }
00076         
00077         static $PiBase;
00078         
00079         if (empty($PiBase)) {
00080             $PiBase = new tslib_pibase();
00081         }
00082                     
00083         if ($withCObject && empty($PiBase->cObj)) {
00084             MOC_EID::cObjOnTSFE();
00085             $PiBase->cObj = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->cObj;
00086         }
00087         
00088         return $PiBase;
00089     }
